alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Rutherford; Warren; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 12:38PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western De Kalb, southeastern Rutherford, western Warren, Coffee, southeastern Wilson, northwestern Grundy and Cannon Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Walterhill to near Tullahoma. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Woodbury, Alexandria, Morrison, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Centertown, Viola, Lascassas, Beechgrove, Summitville, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Hillsboro, Pelham, Bradyville, Milton, Readyville, Arnold AFB and Woods Reservoir MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Rutherford; Warren; Wilson
